subject: Order #SSN3190
description_text:
Hi,

I recently ordered the "Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback" but have only received the pedals without the haptics, I didn't received 2 different tracking numbers so I believe these are missing from the order/delivery?

Kind Regards
Nathan Bradbury

conversations.body_text: Hi Nathan Bradbury,    Please don't worry. Here's another tracking link for your shipment. It's expected to arrive around the 12th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEKK0551350931YQ
